home.card.movingmotivators.title: Moving Motivators
home.card.movingmotivators.text: Define which motivators are important to you. Place the cards in order and discuss how change affects your motivators.
home.card.delegationpoker.title: Delegation Poker
home.card.delegationpoker.text: The objective is to drive home the idea of delegating decisions and tasks to your team within a controlled environment.

movingmotivator.play.card_acceptance.tex: The people around me approve of what I do and who I am.
movingmotivator.play.card_curiosity.text: I have plenty of things to investigate and to tkink about.
movingmotivator.play.card_freedom.title: freedom
movingmotivator.play.card_freedom.text: I am independent of others with my work and my responsibilities.
movingmotivator.play.card_goal.title: goal
movingmotivator.play.card_goal.text: My purpose in life is reflected in the work that I do.
movingmotivator.play.card_honor.title: honor
movingmotivator.play.card_honor.text: I feel proud that my personal values are reflected in how I work.
movingmotivator.play.card_mastery.title: mastery
movingmotivator.play.card_mastery.text: My work challenges my competence but it is still within my abilities.
movingmotivator.play.card_order.title: order
movingmotivator.play.card_order.text: There are enough rules and policies for a stable environment.
movingmotivator.play.card_power.title: power
movingmotivator.play.card_power.text: Thereâ€™s enough room for me to influence what happens around me.
movingmotivator.play.card_relatedness.te: I have good social contacts with the people in my work.
movingmotivator.play.card_status.title: status
movingmotivator.play.card_status.text: My position is good, and recognized by the people who work with me.

delegationpoker.room.card.sell.title: Sell
delegationpoker.room.card.sell.text: I will try and sell it to them
delegationpoker.room.card.consult.title: Consult
delegationpoker.room.card.consult.text: I will consult and then decide
delegationpoker.room.card.agree.title: Agree
delegationpoker.room.card.advise.title: Advise
delegationpoker.room.card.advise.text: I will advise but they decide
delegationpoker.room.card.inquire.title: Inquire
delegationpoker.room.card.inquire.text: I will inquire after they decide
